title: Hammer
text: The Hammer is an island in the [[Lhazaar Principalities]]. Amazingly, this "island" isn't a natural island at all; it's actually a gigantic earth [[elemental]] from [[Lamannia]]! It never ventures far from its position off the coast of [[Lorghalan]] and [[Dreadwood Isle]], but it tends to swat at any sailing vessels that make their way into its bay.
